channel.title: [PI] Adding items to FormationX V3
channel.description:
Hey guys, I downloaded FormationX a while ago and I've done a fair amount of editting on it, but i was having a look through the client and found there was no itemdef.java ? or even item.java for that matter, So i was wondering how the hell would i add custom items? I dont want to go over board on items but i would like to know how so that way i can maybe fix up a few items, etc
If someone knows how to add items please let me know :) Thanks!

item.title: [PI] Adding items to FormationX V3
item.dc:creator: @Arch_n_2h Arch n 2h
item.description:
@Arch_n_2h wrote:

dude its partly same as [pi], just use itemdef

Read full topic
